Amyris recognizes that our core values of innovation, 
collaboration, safety and integrity, along with amyrous 
(meaning to love what we do and what we make), are brought 
to life by having a truly diverse workforce that both reflects the 
markets we serve and the ability to understand and meet the 
needs of the people we make our products for.
